game.name: The Coma 2B: Catacomb
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Coma 2B: Catacomb은 한국 생존 호러 어드벤처 게임입니다. 전작 The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters의 후속 스토리이자, 모든 시리즈의 스토리를 잇는 다리 역할의 게임입니다. The Coma 1의 주인공 영호가 돌아와 무시무시한 거울 차원으로 또다시 모험을 떠납니다...
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Coma 2B: Catacomb is a Korean survival horror adventure. It is the back story to the previous game, The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters, and a story bridge for the full series. You return as Youngho, the hero from The Coma 1, as you once again venture forth into the terrifying mirror dimension…

reviewHighlights.text: I would give this a very light recommendation. The first two Coma games are excellent and well worth playing, as such when I saw there was a more acti...
I've played the first two games, and this is a pretty good interquel/side-story. I've totally beat it multiple times, with every achievement unlocked....
